title: The Best Labor Day Sales and Deals 2019
text:
Photo: Bettmann/Bettmann Archive

As it happens, a whole bunch of Labor Day sales have already begun — with many more rolling out through the weekend. (Which means you can enjoy your weekend at the beach without worrying about missing out on 70 percent off Rag & Bone jeans or discounted mattresses.) We’ll be updating this post accordingly, with the sales actually worth paying attention to (because a lot of them are decidedly not), so keep checking back on the regular.

Urban Outfitters

All sale items are an extra 40 percent off. (We’ve highlighted some more picks from this sale-on-sale here.)

Topo Designs Accessory Nylon Shoulder Bag $12 (was $36, now 67% off) $12 at Urban Outfitters Buy

Ulta

Deals on various beauty products through the long weekend.

Clinique Chubby Stick Baby Tint Moisturizing Lip Colour Balm $14 (was $19, now 26% off) $14 at Ulta Beauty Buy

Clinique Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Mineral Sunscreen Fluid For Face $21 (was $28, now 25% off) $21 at Ulta Beauty Buy

Too Faced Better Than Sex Mascara and Diamonds $18 (was $25, now 28% off) $18 at Ulta Beauty Buy

Maisonette

Take an extra 25 percent off sale items with the code EXTRA25.

Lorena Canals Little Biscuit Washable Round Rug $113 (was $200, now 44% off) $113 at Maisonette Buy with code: EXTRA25

Sunny with an A Exclusive Doodle Loungewear Dress $37 (was $65, now 43% off) $37 at Maisonette Buy with code: EXTRA25

Yoox

Select sale items are an extra 20 percent off.

Walmart

Various deals and savings here.

Nordstrorm

Nordstrom says that its Labor Day sale has discounts up to 40 percent, but we’ve found a bunch of stuff that’s half-off.

Natori Feathers Underwire Contour Bra $34 (was $68, now 50% off) $34 at Nordstrom Buy

Carhartt Work In Progress x Nalgene Water Bottle $29 (was $48, now 40% off) $29 at Nordstrom Buy

Nike Air Max 1 Premium Sneaker $65 (was $130, now 50% off) $65 at Nordstrom Buy

Diane von Furstenberg

Sale items are an additional 25 percent off with the code SALEONSALE.

Diane von Furstenberg Lily Silk Crepe De Chine Midi Dress $149 (was $498, now 70% off) $149 at Diane von Furstenberg Buy with code: SALEONSALE

Diane von Furstenberg High-Waisted Flare Pant $128 (was $428, now 70% off) $128 at Diane von Furstenberg Buy with code: SALEONSALE

Diane von Furstenberg Long Sleeve Chunky Striped Turtleneck Sweater $149 (was $498, now 70% off) $149 at Diane von Furstenberg Buy with code: SALEONSALE

ASOS

Take 20 percent off most items with code LABORDAY20.

Rains Short Jacket $75 (was $94, now 20% off) $75 at ASOS Buy with code: LABORDAY20

The Ordinary Ascorbyl Glucoside Solution 12% 30ml $10 (was $13, now 23% off) $10 at ASOS Buy with code: LABORDAY20

Backcountry

Take 20 percent off (nearly) any item.

Patagonia Black Hole 90L Duffel $90 (was $149, now 40% off) $90 at Backcountry Buy

Patagonia Retro Pile Hooded Jacket - Women's $119 (was $149, now 20% off) $119 at Backcountry Buy with code: TAKE20

Macy’s

Various Labor Day deals with code WKND.

Martha Stewart Signature Scallop 3-Pc. Full/Queen Duvet Set $90 (was $300, now 70% off) $90 at Macy's Buy with code: WKND

First Impressions Baby Boys Monster-Print T-Shirt $5 (was $13, now 62% off) $5 at Macy's Buy with code: WKND

Cuisinart DCC-3400 PerfecTemp 12-Cup Thermal Coffeemaker $117 (was $163, now 28% off) $117 at Macy's Buy with code: WKND

Marimekko Ojakelkukka Cotton 3-Pc. Full/Queen Duvet Cover Set $150 (was $250, now 40% off) $150 at Macy's Buy

Paula’s Choice

Take 20 percent off, sitewide.

Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant $24 (was $30, now 20% off) $24 at Paula's Choice Buy

The Outnet

Clothes and accessories are up to 85 percent off.

adidas by Stella McCartney Mesh-Paneled Coated Printed Stretch Leggings $30 (was $120, now 75% off) $30 at The Outnet Buy

Solid & Striped Anne Marie Striped Swimsuit $68 (was $168, now 60% off) $68 at The Outnet Buy

L.L. Bean

Stuff is up to 75 percent off as part of a summer clearance.

The Tot

At the Tot, take a extra 30 percent off all sales items with the code EXTRA30.

Meri Meri Organic Cotton Rainbow Cushion $25 (was $50, now 50% off) $25 at The Tot Buy with code: EXTRA30

Anthropologie

Sale items are an extra 50 percent off at checkout.

Daniel Rainn Lourdes Lace Top $30 (was $90, now 67% off) $30 at Anthropologie Buy

Huckberry

Various Labor Day “steals.”

Revolve

Up to 65 percent off at Revolve, on women’s clothing, shoes, and accessories.

Wayfair

Home goods are up to 75 percent off. We rounded up some of our favorite finds here.

Bahia Left Hand Facing Sectional $800 (was $1,050, now 24% off) $800 at Wayfair Buy

REI

Gear, clothes, and accessories are on sale. Read our coverage of the sale here.

Patagonia Black Hole Wheeled Duffel $149 (was $299, now 50% off) $149 at REI Buy

REI Co-op Nalgene Wide-Mouth Water Bottle - 32 fl. oz. $5 (was $11, now 55% off) $5 at REI Buy

Amazon

Various TVs and speakers are on sale. We wrote about the Frame TV here.

Samsung Frame 55-Inch QLED 4K LS03 Series Ultra HD Smart TV $1,398 (was $1,798, now 22% off) $1,398 at Amazon Buy

Samsung 2.1 Soundbar HW-R550 with Wireless Subwoofer $228 (was $280, now 19% off) $228 at Amazon Buy

JBL Xtreme 2 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker $220 (was $300, now 27% off) $220 at Amazon Buy

Mattresses!

So many mattresses are on sale that we decided to round them all up here.

Boll & Branch

All pillows, duvet inserts, and mattresses are 20 percent off.

Carbon38

All summer styles are an extra 40 percent off with the code BYESUMMER.

adidas by Stella McCartney Performance Essentials Short Over Tight $44 (was $85, now 48% off) $44 at Carbon38 Buy with code: BYESUMMER

Floyd

Save up to $150 with the code LABOROFLOVE. Read our review of this sofa here.

The Floyd Sofa $1,340 (was $1,490, now 10% off) $1,340 at Floyd Buy with code: LABOROFLOVE

The Bouqs Co.

Take 20 percent off all flowers from August 29 through September 1. Things are even cheaper — 25 percent off — on September 2. Read our review of the online flower delivery service here.

The Bouqs Co. Ace Flower Bouquet $35 (was $44, now 20% off) $35 at The Bouqs Company Buy with code: LD20

Framebridge

All frames that cost over $50 are 15 percent off with the code LABORDAY. You can read our review of the service (which is our favorite of the new online framing startups) here.

Brooklinen

Through September 3, all orders under $200 are 10 percent off, and all orders over $200 are 15 percent off. Could be a good time to finally splurge on a linen duvet cover.

The Strategist is designed to surface the most useful, expert recommendations for things to buy across the vast e-commerce landscape. Some of our latest conquests include the best women’s jeans, rolling luggage, bed sheets, coffee makers, and bath towels. We update links when possible, but note that deals can expire and all prices are subject to change.



Every editorial product is independently selected. If you buy something through our links, New York may earn an affiliate commission.
description: A roundup of the best Labor Day sales, featuring the discounts actually worth paying attention to from the likes of Wayfair, Amazon, Brooklinen, and more.
